attributes.action: stop the charge of £5 when paying t.v. licence by direct debit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like the  charge of £5 stopped when paying your t.v. licence by direct debit as stated  before that it was cheaper and easier to pay by direct debit the amount of people that dont know about this is unbelevable. again we are all being ripped off. so please stop this over charging now .
